item.title: Yuchen's Academic Page
item.description:
Yuchen Song / 宋裕琛

I'm currently pursuing the Ph.D. degree with the School of Electronic Engineering, BUPT. My primary research interests include optical performance modeling and optimization in wideband optical networks, digital twin networks, physics-informed machine learning, and large models for optical networks.
